review: First of all I would prefer Dr.  Vibha Rathore for others who are anticipating for pregnancy.  She will be analysing the issue and gives clear explanation on what to do and what not to do. We are actually wating from 4+ years and after visiting Dr. Vibha mam, with in first two months pregnancy was confirmed....  This is all because of her way of treating the patients...  Very happy to share my views.
She is very good doctor..she will spend time  then explains you and majorly she Pumps you the confidence

Doctor is very experienced but would really not recommend if you are looking for * ************** gynecologist. Made me feel uncomfortable about my personal choices and was insensitive in addressing my questions about contraception.

She was extremely kind, patient and empathetic. This was my first time meeting a gynecologist and she made me feel very comfortable. She was non-judgemental and took time to listen and understand my health issues. I would definitely recommend her.
